title: America Enslaved to Debt | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Jaco Booyens | 4/28/21
description:
President Biden’s first address to Congress is set to fundamentally transform the country. Why has no designated survivor been chosen? Glenn reviews just how insane our national debt has gotten in the past year, as Biden gears up to propose another $1.8 trillion for his "American Families Plan." We’re being made slaves to our debt. Journalist Jason Whitlock joins to preview a speech of his own on the African American journey and give his thoughts on LeBron James and reports that the FBI is looking into “extremists” without warrants. South African native Jaco Booyens warns that America is heading down the same path toward extreme racial equity, affirmative action, and vengeance.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
